summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the registration and bonding of side sewer contractors; amending Ordinance 97016, Sections 2, 5, 6, 13 and 27, Seattle Municipal Code Sections 21.16.030, .060, .070, .040, and .280 and Ordinance 82583, Section 2 (SMC S 21.24.020); adding a new Section 21.16.056 to provide for cancellation of registration; and increasing the required property damage insurance.
